Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Grand. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Grand.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Exchange
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 75th, Exchange, 76th, Coles, and 75th, due to, street blockage, near 75th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 75th, Exchange, 76th, Coles, and 75th, due to, street blockage, near 75th/Exchange.

Allow extra travel time.
